title: Mosaic's Rosen on Lending Money to Solar Homeowners  (Audio)
itunes:title: Mosaic's Rosen on Lending Money to Solar Homeowners  (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Dan Rosen, Co-Founder and President of Mosaic, on the companye's recent funding of $220 million, and how the company makes money lending to solar homeowners.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
